reviews.text: Me and 3 girl-friends stayed in these apartments in September. We booked a 1 bedroom apartment and we were pleasantly surprised at the standard of the room. For the price we paid, we were expecting very little, however the room was well equipped, clean and comfortable. The kitchenette was tiny, but we only used the fridge to store drinks.
reviews.title: Great Stay at these Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The recent complaints on Tripadvisor about the night porter put us off before we even arrived, however we found him to be friendly and helpful. We checked in at 2am with no hassle, he booked us taxi's and waved to us when we staggered in at 6am!!
reviews.title: great budget apartments

reviews.text: Aircon is an extra cost, but I have to say well worth it. In fact it was probably the best hotel air con I've had in a while. So cold, we had to keep turning it up!!
reviews.title: Excellent value for money, great location.

reviews.text: The hotel is noisy and full of young party people, so don't expect to have to a quiet stay. However, if you’re there for the night scene it's perfect.
reviews.title: Fourth time in Ibiza never staying anywhere else again!

reviews.text: The bar in the hotel serves food which is the cheapest around and really good portions / value. The first day we made the mistake of eating elsewhere at double the price...Didn't do that again!!
reviews.title: Great apartments, decent location, beware air conditioning charges.
